name: Frittelle di patate di Mondstadt
desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. A little bit of pinecone helps give it a nice crunch, and great with a bit of jam. Loved by people of all ages.

value.text: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

value.name: Ricetta: frittelle di patate di Mondstadt
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Mondstadt Hash Brown.

value.name: Pigna
value.desc: Filled with oil-rich seeds. Certainly won't be growing into a tree from inside a squirrel's stomach.

value.name: Patata
value.desc: Un ortaggio robusto. Un dono della terra che può essere cucinato in un'infinità di modi e che, per questo, non annoia mai.

value.name: Marmellata
value.desc: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.

value.name: Frittelle di patate di Mondstadt deliziose
value.desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. Close your eyes and feel the mild breeze and sweet dew that Mondstadt offers.

value.name: Frittelle di patate di Mondstadt sospette
value.desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. It's said that a hash brown without jam is not worthy of the Mondstadt name... But is this even a hash brown?

value.name: Razor
value.desc: Un ragazzo che vive con i lupi nel Regno dei Lupi di Mondstadt, lontano dalla civiltà umana. Rapido come il fulmine.

value.name: Frittelle di patate a forma di zampa
value.desc: Razor's specialty. Carefully shaped to resemble a wolf's paw. You can really feel the effort he has put into trying human cooking.
